name: Cave Ace
description:
Cave Ace is a simple scrolling shooter which takes an unexpected setting. The prehistoric times! Mount on your pterodactyl, shout Unga Bunga, and take the sky!

To play simple click and drag the mouse to control the player, it automatically shoots when the mouse click is held down.

This game is my entry to the Indie World Order CaveJam, where we needed to create a game with the "Unga Bunga" theme.

I had planned on develop a mini story mode, to feature a half dozen enemies, three power ups and a boss.

In the end I had only time available to make an endless mode, two enemies, and the power ups. and sadly I couldn't add sounds to the game.

Game made using Flame Engine
